alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 1:37PM PST until January 13 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MST /1 PM PST/ THURSDAY TO 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. The Upper Weiser Basin and Baker County valleys will see totals of 5 to 10 inches through Saturday. In the West Central and Boise Mountains total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches in mountain valleys with 20 to 30 inches in the mountains. * Wind gusts as high as 45 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...Portions of west central Idaho and northeast Oregon. * WHEN...From 2 PM MST /1 PM PST/ Thursday to 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
